title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 412.2 - Certification by operator or administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 412.2 - Certification by operator or administrator

State Regulations
(a) The report shall be certified by the
operator or the administrator on behalf of the operator of the residential
health care facility. (b) The form
of the certification required in subdivision (a) of this section shall be
prescribed in the report form provided by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
412.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
